name: Solitaire Zen: Space
description:
The world's first virtual reality Solitaire! Prepare yourself for the stunningly gorgeous, spectacularly immersive Solitaire Zen: Space. It's classic Klondike (Windows) Solitaire like you've never seen it before. Transport yourself to a world of pure bliss as you glide slowly through space.

• STUNNING 3D GRAPHICS •
Look around at the cards, the environment, the sky...liberate yourself from the shackles of forced perspective.

• BATTLE FIERCE COMPETITION •
Realtime leaderboards pit you against players all over the world. Become a Solitaire superstar!

• LEVEL UP •
Gain experience, level up, and earn new ranks and badges.

STACKED WITH FEATURES
• Gyroscopic virtual reality controls
• Staggering graphics
• Hyper-realistic ambient audio
• Global online leaderboards
• Leveling and ranking system

• JOIN OVER 100 MILLION GAMERS WORLDWIDE •
Follow @Naquatic on Facebook and Twitter to find out why our apps like MonsterCrafter and Shooting Showdown have been featured by everyone from Apple to IGN, AppAdvice, and TouchArcade.
